name: teabag
description:
This game is about a tea bag who owes a mafia boss a lot of money and has to do a favor for the boss to spare him.

if dialog gliches out press backwards.

very short rpg. something like undertale.

this game was created for 2023 Street Grimoire TTRPG jam in 6days, but  because misunderstanding it doesnt fit with jams theme.
